name: Associação para a Competitividade da Indústria da Fileira Florestal
goal: Increased and develop Portuguese Forest Based Industry cluster ( includes: social partners, small and large businesses, research and development enterprises, environmental organizations, including nongovernmental organizations, qualification sectorial centers, universities)
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Regional Policy, Trade
euInitiatives: All concerning forests, CAP, bioeconomy, industry 4.0, climate action, wildfires, forests pests and diseases
